explains: n. 服从，遵守；屈从，迁就；可塑性，柔量
wordGroup: compliance audit 合规性审计；符合规章审计；法规符合审计
patient compliance 病人的依从性；病人的配合度
tax compliance 税收遵从；守法纳税
compliance test 验证检验；符合性程序
certificate of compliance 符合证明；一致的证明；合约完成证明书
compliance officer 合规官员；监察主任

sentences.en: There are penalties for non-compliance with the fire regulations.
sentences.cn: 不遵守消防规章的行为要受到处罚。

sentences.en: Inspectors were sent to visit nuclear sites and verify compliance with the treaty.
sentences.cn: 监察员被派去参观核址并核实条约的遵守情况。

sentences.en: The U.N. Security Council has linked any lifting of sanctions to compliance with the ceasefire terms.
sentences.cn: 联合国安全理事会将任何制裁的解除与遵守停火条款联系起来。
